messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: help me !
messages.msgSnippet: Paul: Your name in japaneses is PORU... You can write your name in KATAKANA, Katakana is the silabary for foreing names or word. Saludos desde Argentina..!!
messages.messageBody:
Paul: Your name in japaneses is PORU... You can write your name in KATAKANA,
Katakana is the silabary for foreing names or word.

Saludos desde Argentina..!!

spacesquad@... wrote:

> Hello everybody ...
> My name is Paul,i´m 18 Ys and I live in Brazil.
> I´m new around here so i would like to tell all of you guys that i´m very
> happy to join the samurai history.

> I would like to ask if one of you know the name of a site were I can find

> To view how it´s spell and the kanji form of it...
> Or maybe a site in the net were I could find a good name in japanese for
> me, due to my courage, strengh, etc... those kind of things.
> Does anyone knows ????????
> Please tell me......
> Well, that´s it.
> Paul
